SEARCH
Package com.smsapp.services.interfaces

Interface ITeacher

All Known Implementing Classes:
TeacherImpl
public interface ITeacher
Provides methods for managing teacher-related operations in the School Management System.

This interface defines the CRUD operations and additional methods for handling teacher data. Implementations of this interface should provide the actual logic for interacting with the teacher data in the database.

Author:
MonigaBalasubramanian

  • Method Details

    • addTeacher

      void addTeacher(Teacher teacher)
      Adds a new teacher to the system.
      Parameters:
      teacher - the Teacher object to be added
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the teacher object is null

    • getTeacherById

      Teacher getTeacherById(int teacherId) throws TeacherNotFoundException
      Retrieves a teacher by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the unique identifier of the teacher
      Returns:
      the Teacher object with the specified ID
      Throws:
      TeacherNotFoundException - if no teacher with the specified ID is found

    • getAllTeachers

      List<Teacher> getAllTeachers()
      Retrieves a list of all teachers in the system.
      Returns:
      a List of Teacher objects

    • updateTeacher

      void updateTeacher(Teacher teacher) throws TeacherNotFoundException
      Updates the details of an existing teacher.
      Parameters:
      teacher - the Teacher object containing updated information
      Throws:
      TeacherNotFoundException - if the teacher with the specified ID does not exist
      IllegalArgumentException - if the teacher object is null

    • deleteTeacher

      void deleteTeacher(int teacherId) throws TeacherNotFoundException
      Deletes a teacher from the system by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the unique identifier of the teacher to be deleted
      Throws:
      TeacherNotFoundException - if no teacher with the specified ID is found

    • assignStudentsToTeacher

      void assignStudentsToTeacher(int teacherId, List<Integer> studentIds) throws TeacherNotFoundException
      Assigns a list of students to a teacher.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the unique identifier of the teacher
      studentIds - a List of student IDs to be assigned to the teacher
      Throws:
      TeacherNotFoundException - if no teacher with the specified ID is found
      IllegalArgumentException - if the list of student IDs is null
